name: Frostnight's Glory
description: A bone plate taken from the horned crown of a defeated Frostnight Scion.  A warmth as glossy as moonlight envelopes it, radiating strongly even in thedead of winter nights. In a sense, just like the Frostmoon Scions, this is thelast thing these noble creatures stand by. The master they once served hasbeen reduced to dust, yet their dreams still glow with golden splendor.
